description: Step into Urbanist Architecture’s private studio in the heart of Greenwich. Explore a space crafted by our interior designers and join our team for insightful talks on tackling Minor Developments in Backland/Infill Sites and navigating the complexities of Green and Grey Belt planning.

factsheet.heading: Designing in the Margins: Architecture at the Edge
paragraphs: Step inside Urbanist Architecture’s design studio in the heart of Greenwich for an inspiring look at how creative planning and architecture thrive in overlooked and restricted spaces.

Our team of architects and planners will open the doors to our private studio for a rare behind-the-scenes experience. Join us for engaging talks on how we approach Backland and Infill developments, and how we navigate the unique challenges of Green and Grey Belt planning - some of the most pressing issues in London’s built environment today.

Visitors will have the chance to explore a thoughtfully designed interior workspace, speak directly with the team, and learn how we transform tight constraints into opportunities for beauty, sustainability, and innovation. Whether you're an aspiring architect, a homeowner, or simply curious about how cities evolve, you'll leave with a deeper understanding of how great design can emerge from even the trickiest sites.

name: Urbanist Architecture Studio
